00037 CellCacheScanner::CellCacheScanner(CellCachePtr &cellcache, ScanContextPtr &scan_ctx) : CellListScanner(scan_ctx), m_cell_cache_ptr(cellcache), m_cell_cache_mutex(cellcache->m_mutex), m_cur_key(0), m_cur_value(0), m_eos(false) {
00038   ByteString bs;
00039   size_t start_row_len = scan_ctx->start_row.length() + 1;
00040   size_t end_row_len = scan_ctx->end_row.length() + 1;
00041   DynamicBuffer dbuf(7 + std::max(start_row_len, end_row_len));
00042 
00043   {
00044     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_cell_cache_mutex);
00045     Key key;
00046 
00047     assert(scan_ctx->start_row <= scan_ctx->end_row);
00048 
00050     dbuf.clear();
00051     append_as_byte_string(dbuf, scan_ctx->start_row.c_str(), start_row_len);
00052     bs.ptr = dbuf.base;
00053     m_start_iter = m_cell_cache_ptr->m_cell_map.lower_bound(bs);
00054 
00056     dbuf.clear();
00057     append_as_byte_string(dbuf, scan_ctx->end_row.c_str(), end_row_len);
00058     bs.ptr = dbuf.base;
00059     m_end_iter = m_cell_cache_ptr->m_cell_map.lower_bound(bs);
00060 
00061     m_cur_iter = m_start_iter;
00062 
00063     while (m_cur_iter != m_end_iter) {
00064       if (!key.load((*m_cur_iter).first)) {
00065         HT_ERROR("Problem parsing key!");
00066       }
00067       else if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW || m_scan_context_ptr->family_mask[key.column_family_code]) {
00068         m_cur_key = (*m_cur_iter).first;
00069         m_cur_value.ptr = m_cur_key.ptr + (CellCache::OFFSET_BIT_MASK & (*m_cur_iter).second);
00070         return;
00071       }
00072       m_cur_iter++;
00073     }
00074     m_eos = true;
00075     return;
00076   }
00077 
00078 }

00081 bool CellCacheScanner::get(ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00082   if (!m_eos) {
00083     key = m_cur_key;
00084     value = m_cur_value;
00085     return true;
00086   }
00087   return false;
00088 }

00092 void CellCacheScanner::forward() {
00093   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_cell_cache_mutex);
00094   Key key;
00095 
00096   m_cur_iter++;
00097   while (m_cur_iter != m_end_iter) {
00098     if (!key.load((*m_cur_iter).first)) {
00099       HT_ERROR("Problem parsing key!");
00100     }
00101     else if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW || m_scan_context_ptr->family_mask[key.column_family_code]) {
00102       m_cur_key = (*m_cur_iter).first;
00103       m_cur_value.ptr = m_cur_key.ptr + (CellCache::OFFSET_BIT_MASK & (*m_cur_iter).second);
00104       return;
00105     }
00106     m_cur_iter++;
00107   }
00108   m_eos = true;
00109 }
